I failed with a 156, and having sugar in urine! Went to do the 3 hr and let me tell you that I did pass

I failed the 1 hour but passed the 3 hour.If you fail the 3 hour test, you'll see a dietician and try to keep your sugars down just by changing your diet  If that doesn't work,  they'll put you on meds.
